com.io7m.r1.exceptions

Class RExceptionNotSupported

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.io7m.r1.exceptions.RException
          • com.io7m.r1.exceptions.RExceptionNotSupported
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @EqualityReference
public final class RExceptionNotSupported
extends RException
    An exception raised when a feature is used that is not supported on the current OpenGL implementation.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
